Dialogue.Page: IRW: This is Icy R...an anyone respond? I repeat, this is Icy Ridges West Settlement, can anyon...pond?!
IRW: We are ...ergency situation, can any...spond!?
IRE: This is Icy Ridges East Settlement, we read you Icy Ridges West Settlement, but there seems to be some interference.
IRW: We are having an emergency situation, a ...touched down in the settlement! I repeat, a tornado ha...n the settlement!
IRW: Ther...tensive fires, and we have multiple inju...eat, there are extensive fires...ve multiple injuries!
IRE: Understood Icy Ridges East Settlement, we are sending over Minnow and a rescue crew to help with evacuation!
IRE: Radio back if the situation changes, we're going to get in contact with the Outer Wilds Rescue team at Ravenous Tides Settlement. Icy Ridges East Settlement out.
